IllustrationConfig.description:
Configuration for illustration generation.

This model defines the settings and preferences for generating
illustrations for translation segments.

style.description: The artistic style for generated illustrations

style_hints.description: Additional style hints or preferences for illustration generation
style_hints.title: Style Hints

segments_per_illustration.description: Number of segments to combine for each illustration
segments_per_illustration.title: Segments Per Illustration

max_illustrations.description: Maximum number of illustrations to generate (None for unlimited)
max_illustrations.title: Max Illustrations

skip_dialogue_heavy.description: Skip illustration for segments that are mostly dialogue
skip_dialogue_heavy.title: Skip Dialogue Heavy

min_segment_length.description: Minimum segment length (characters) to generate illustration
min_segment_length.title: Min Segment Length

IllustrationConfig.title: IllustrationConfig

IllustrationData.description:
Data model for a generated illustration.

This model contains all the information about a single generated
illustration, including its location, metadata, and generation details.

segment_index.description: Index of the segment this illustration belongs to
segment_index.title: Segment Index

file_path.description: File path to the generated illustration
file_path.title: File Path

prompt.description: The prompt used to generate this illustration
prompt.title: Prompt

style.description: The style used for this illustration

width.description: Width of the illustration in pixels
width.title: Width

height.description: Height of the illustration in pixels
height.title: Height

generation_time.description: Time taken to generate the illustration in seconds
generation_time.title: Generation Time

IllustrationData.title: IllustrationData

description:
Container for batch illustration generation results.

This model holds the results of generating illustrations for
multiple segments in a batch operation.

job_id.description: Translation job ID this batch belongs to
job_id.title: Job Id

skipped_segments.description: Number of segments skipped for illustration
skipped_segments.title: Skipped Segments

total_generation_time.description: Total time taken for batch generation in seconds
total_generation_time.title: Total Generation Time

title: IllustrationBatch
